page.title: 11GREETWELL HALL
page.content: {GREETWELL HALL}WAS ORIGNALLY 3 FARMS IT IS NOW 1BIG FARM.{MR WARDS}DAD BOUGHT THE HOUSE IN 1956.{MR WARDS } DAD BOUGHT THE HOUSE FROM SOMEONE ELSE.HIS DAD HAD TO ALTER IT TO HIS LIKING.THE HOUSE WAS BUILT BEFORETHE DOMESDAY BOOK.HIS DAD LIVED THERE FOR 29 YEARS.{MR WARDS }DAD LIKES THE HOUSE ALOT.{MR WARD }OWNS A BIT OF LAND APART FROM THE HOUSE.HE ALSO HAS SOME HISTORY ABOUT THE HOUSE IN WRITING.{MR WARD}LIVES IN THE HOUSE.{ {MR WARD}THINKS THE HOUSE IS VERY NICE TO LIVE IN.{MR WARD}IS THE FARM MANAGER HE HAS ALOT OF CATTLE HE ALSO HAS 7 FULL TIME MEN.{MR WARD}HAS 3 WOODS OAK TREES AND 20 ACRES OF FARM.IN THE CHURCH YARD THE OLDEST GRAVE IS 1 THOUSAND YEARS OLD.{MR WARD RENTS THE FARM.HE IS {NOT MARRIED}HE HAS 150 CATTLE.{MR WARD}HAS A 860 ACRE FARM A PRETTY BIG GARDEN!!
